Class JnrPcapAdapter

java.lang.Object
ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.capture.libpcap.JnrPcapAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Pcap, AutoCloseable
public final class JnrPcapAdapter extends Object implements Pcap
JNR libpcap adapter with zero per-packet heap allocation: uses a per-thread reusable scratch buffer that grows as needed.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface Pcap

    Pcap.PacketCallback

  • Method Details

    • openLive

      public PcapHandle openLive(String iface, int snap, boolean promisc, int timeoutMs, int bufferBytes, boolean immediate) throws PcapException
      Opens a live capture handle using libpcap.
      Specified by:
      openLive in interface Pcap
      Parameters:
      iface - network interface name
      snap - snap length in bytes
      promisc - whether to enable promiscuous mode
      timeoutMs - poll timeout in milliseconds
      bufferBytes - capture buffer size in bytes
      immediate - whether to enable immediate mode
      Returns:
      activated PcapHandle
      Throws:
      PcapException - if any libpcap call fails
      Since:
      RADAR 0.1-doc

    • openOffline

      public PcapHandle openOffline(Path file, int snap) throws PcapException
      Opens an offline capture handle using libpcap.
      Specified by:
      openOffline in interface Pcap
      Parameters:
      file - pcap or pcapng file path
      snap - snap length in bytes used when copying frames
      Returns:
      activated PcapHandle
      Throws:
      PcapException - if the file cannot be opened
      Since:
      RADAR 0.1-doc
